message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this excellent product at a special introductory price of $10,000. It's a fantastic deal you don't want to miss!
I'm interested in the product, but I think $10,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $7,000 for it. Can you meet me halfway?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $10,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $9,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $7,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
